Welcome to minecraftstatus’ documentation!

exception minecraftstatus.BadTextFormation

Exception raised when the characters passed are not between 1 and 30 for some endpoints.

class minecraftstatus.MCStatus

The main MCStatus class.

async achievement(achievement: str)
Parameters

achievement (str) – name of the achievement to display.

Raises

BadTextFormation – text passed is not between 1-30 characters

Returns

an io.BytesIO object co-relating the achievement image.

async get_server(ip_address: str)
Parameters

ip_address (str) – IP address of the server

Raises

ServerNotFound – server not found or is offline

Returns

a ServerStatus class instance with the following attributes

host
Type

The host of the server.

port
Type

The port of the server.

is_online
Type

True if the server is online, False otherwise.

latency
Type

The latency of the server.

max_players
Type

The maximum players of the server.

online_players
Type

The online players of the server.

motd
Type

The message of the day of the server.

favicon
Type

The base64 data of the favicon of the server.

game_map
Type

The game map of the server.

game_mode
Type

The game mode of the server.

async get_server_card(ip_address: str)
Parameters

ip_address (str) – IP address of the server

Raises

BadTextFormation – text passed is not between 1-30 characters

Returns

an io.BytesIO object co-relating the server card image.

async splash_text(text: str)
Parameters

text (str) – text to display in the splash.

Raises

BadTextFormation – text passed is not between 1-30 characters

Returns

an io.BytesIO object co-relating the splash text image.

exception minecraftstatus.ServerNotFound(address: str)

Exception raised when a server is not found or is offline. Has the following attribute:

address
Type

(str)the address of the server passed.
